## RouteRuntime interface

路由的运行状态

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteRuntime<TStoreState extends StoreState = StoreState> 
```

## Remarks

可以通过 [IRouter.runtime](./vue-taro.irouter.runtime.md) 获得

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [completed](./vue-taro.routeruntime.completed.md) | boolean | 路由跳转是否已经完成 |
|  [payload](./vue-taro.routeruntime.payload.md) | unknown | 路由跳转时附加的数据 |
|  [prevState](./vue-taro.routeruntime.prevstate.md) | TStoreState | 路由跳转前的store状态 |
|  [timestamp](./vue-taro.routeruntime.timestamp.md) | number | 路由跳转发生的时间戳 |
